description.title: The description Schema
examples: The AMM liquidity management protocol Revert Finance disclosed on Twitter that its v3utils contract was attacked, and 90% of the funds were stolen from a single account. The stolen assets included: 22983.235188 USDC, 4106.316699 USDT, 485.5786287699002 OP, 0.18217977664322793 WETH, 36.59093198260223 DAI, 211.21463945524238 WMATIC and 22 Premia. At current prices, that's about $29,000.
The Baby Doll (BABYDOLL) project was hit by a flash loan attack, losing 25 BNB (~$7,900). BSC contract address is 0x449cfecbc8e8469eeda869fca6cccd326ece0c04a1cdd96b23d21f3b599adee2

A fake token project named "Nostr" on the Ethereum chain has run away, and its funds have been transferred to a new EOA address 0xeeB8EB5CC144eDddDB204c3ABA499de6b6081696. In the end, the fraudsters made a profit of 232.1 ETH, worth about $370,000. The token contract is 0xA2be922174605BAd450775C76CEb632369480336.
